attributes.action: close down the court reporting service CAFCASS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: cafcass was set up 10 years ago to help expediate cases going through family court, unfortunately cafcass alienates families causing much distress to the children who's best interests they are ment to serve cafcass has no place in family law and therefore should cease to operate forthwith
